title: Rito, Im not Sayin, Im just Sayin
body:
So, Im just speculating here...

But in the Battle Boss Blitz and Arcade Riven skin artwork, there is a little roster down at the bottom. On one side is all the arcade skins, with a blank space, and on the other side are the two revealed "Boss Skins" with blank spaces, implying a mid will be added to the arcade set and a top, jungle, and adc will be added to the Boss set, as seen here:

http://i.imgur.com/XL0sN9k.jpg

If this is true, I cant help but wonder who will be selected...

AND THEN I REALIZED THAT YOU HAVE A WONDERFUL OPPORTUNITY HERE RITO.

For as we all know, Corki is a wonderful ADC... and HAPPENS TO LOOK JUST LIKE DR. ROBOTNIK, one of the classic arcade super villains.

Now granted, Jinx would also be a cool arcade ADC... but CMON LOOK AT THAT RESEMBLANCE. {{champion:42}}


http://33.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m9fufrktNj1rzswm4o1_1280.gif
